release 3.2.1

For Setup on tomcat 7:

Add jstl config setting as explained in http://stackoverflow.com/a/16091433/830945 
Add notifier recipients manually after setting up database

Changes from previous release:

- Adress template changed. (only one line for address street and area part)
- Changed backgroud and layout vaccine schedule in enrollment an followups and made it better validated and better appear on page
- Added page that shows incentive smses too.
- Modified Homepage data scripts and now it shows correct data
- Immunization Records details page added with incentive details
- Vaccination now has three different statuses (vaccinated, retro, retro_date_missing) which earlier were only on UI and backend only saved vaccinated status
